contentrichtext.text: '''Vijayanagar''' ({{lang-sa|विजयनगर}}) meaning ''City of Victory'' may refer to one of the following: ==Places== ;India *[[Vijayanagara Empire]] of Southern India, 14th-17th centuries A.D. **[[Vijayanagara]], now-ruined capital city of the Vijayanagara Empire *** [[Vijayanagara metropolitan area]] *[[Vijayanagar, Bangalore]], neighborhood in Bangalore city *[[Vijayanagar, Belgaum]], a small village in Belgaum District, Karnataka *[[Vijay Nagar, Indore]], neighborhood in Indore city, Madhya Pradesh ;Nepal *[[Vijaya Nagar]], village in Mangalpur V.D.C., Chitwan District *[[Bijaya Nagar]], V.D.C. in Pyuthan District {{disambiguation}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
